000076  dbd4              BLT      |L5.34|
                  |L5.120|
;;;155    //	ptrCDMACfg = OSQPend(CDMARecieveQ,2,&err);//用以消耗模块自动回复的“+CPIN:READY”
;;;156    //	Mem_free(ptrCDMACfg);
;;;157    }
000078  e8bd83f8          POP      {r3-r9,pc}
;;;158    
                          ENDP

                  |L5.124|
                          DCD      CDMARecieveQ

                          AREA ||i.CDMATask||, CODE, READONLY, ALIGN=2

                          REQUIRE _printf_percent
                          REQUIRE _printf_return_value
                          REQUIRE _printf_d
                          REQUIRE _printf_int_dec
                  CDMATask PROC
;;;37     
;;;38     void CDMATask(void *pdata)
000000  b08a              SUB      sp,sp,#0x28
;;;39     {
;;;40     	uint8_t *pCDMARece = NULL;
000002  2500              MOVS     r5,#0
;;;41     	_CDMADataToSend *pCDMASend = NULL;
000004  2400              MOVS     r4,#0
;;;42     	uint8_t err;
;;;43     	char sendCmd[30];
;;;44     	uint16_t sendlen = 0;
000006  2600              MOVS     r6,#0
;;;45     
;;;46     	CDMAConfigInit();                //初始化配置MG2639
000008  f7fffffe          BL       CDMAConfigInit
;;;47     	LoginDataSend();                 //发送登录报文
00000c  f7fffffe          BL       LoginDataSend
;;;48     	varOperation.isDataFlow = 0;     //开启数据流
000010  2000              MOVS     r0,#0
000012  4944              LDR      r1,|L6.292|
000014  f881002d          STRB     r0,[r1,#0x2d]
;;;49     	
;;;50     	while(1)//todo:断网、断开TCP连接、OTA升级、配置文件下发、登录
000018  e082              B        |L6.288|
                  |L6.26|
;;;51     	{
;;;52     		OSSemPost(sendMsg); //没有发送数据
00001a  4843              LDR      r0,|L6.296|
00001c  6800              LDR      r0,[r0,#0]  ; sendMsg
00001e  f7fffffe          BL       OSSemPost
;;;53     		
;;;54     receCDMA:	
000022  bf00              NOP      
                  |L6.36|
;;;55     		pCDMASend = OSQPend(CDMASendQ,0,&err);
000024  aa09              ADD      r2,sp,#0x24
000026  2100              MOVS     r1,#0
000028  4840              LDR      r0,|L6.300|
00002a  6800              LDR      r0,[r0,#0]  ; CDMASendQ
00002c  f7fffffe          BL       OSQPend
000030  4604              MOV      r4,r0
;;;56     		
;;;57     		OSSemAccept(sendMsg); //正在发送数据 消耗掉发送时的信号量
000032  483d              LDR      r0,|L6.296|
000034  6800              LDR      r0,[r0,#0]  ; sendMsg
000036  f7fffffe          BL       OSSemAccept
;;;58     		
;;;59     		sendlen = sprintf(sendCmd,at_TCPSend,pCDMASend->datLength);
00003a  8822              LDRH     r2,[r4,#0]
00003c  493c              LDR      r1,|L6.304|
00003e  a801              ADD      r0,sp,#4
000040  f7fffffe          BL       __2sprintf
000044  b286              UXTH     r6,r0
;;;60     		CDMASendDatas((uint8_t *)sendCmd,sendlen); //通知CDMA要通过哪个通道发送多少个字节的数据
000046  4631              MOV      r1,r6
000048  a801              ADD      r0,sp,#4
00004a  f7fffffe          BL       CDMASendDatas
;;;61     		
;;;62     		pCDMARece = OSQPend(CDMARecieveQ,150,&err);
00004e  aa09              ADD      r2,sp,#0x24
000050  2196              MOVS     r1,#0x96
000052  4838              LDR      r0,|L6.308|
000054  6800              LDR      r0,[r0,#0]  ; CDMARecieveQ
000056  f7fffffe          BL       OSQPend
00005a  4605              MOV      r5,r0
;;;63     		if(err == OS_ERR_NONE)
00005c  f89d0024          LDRB     r0,[sp,#0x24]
000060  2800              CMP      r0,#0
000062  d13a              BNE      |L6.218|
;;;64     		{
;;;65     			err = CDMAReceDeal(pCDMARece,"DISCONNECTED");
000064  a134              ADR      r1,|L6.312|
000066  4628              MOV      r0,r5
000068  f7fffffe          BL       CDMAReceDeal
00006c  9009              STR      r0,[sp,#0x24]
;;;66     			if(err == 0)                        //TCP断开连接，需要重新连接
00006e  f89d0024          LDRB     r0,[sp,#0x24]
000072  b9c8              CBNZ     r0,|L6.168|
;;;67     			{
;;;68     				Mem_free(pCDMARece);            //释放占用的内存块
000074  4628              MOV      r0,r5
000076  f7fffffe          BL       Mem_free
;;;69     				Mem_free(pCDMASend->data);
00007a  6860              LDR      r0,[r4,#4]
00007c  f7fffffe          BL       Mem_free
;;;70     				Mem_free(pCDMASend);
000080  4620              MOV      r0,r4
000082  f7fffffe          BL       Mem_free
;;;71     			
;;;72     				varOperation.isDataFlow = 1;    //数据流未流动
000086  2001              MOVS     r0,#1
000088  4926              LDR      r1,|L6.292|
00008a  f881002d          STRB     r0,[r1,#0x2d]
;;;73     				freCDMALed = 100;               //CDMA小灯快闪
00008e  2064              MOVS     r0,#0x64
000090  492d              LDR      r1,|L6.328|
000092  8008              STRH     r0,[r1,#0]
;;;74     				CDMAPowerOpen_Close(CDMA_CLOSE);//关闭CDMA电源
000094  2001              MOVS     r0,#1
000096  f7fffffe          BL       CDMAPowerOpen_Close
;;;75     				
;;;76     				CDMAConfigInit();               //重新启动CDMA
00009a  f7fffffe          BL       CDMAConfigInit
;;;77     				varOperation.isDataFlow = 0;    //开启数据流
00009e  2000              MOVS     r0,#0
0000a0  4920              LDR      r1,|L6.292|
0000a2  f881002d          STRB     r0,[r1,#0x2d]
;;;78     				goto receCDMA;
0000a6  e7bd              B        |L6.36|
                  |L6.168|
;;;79     			}
;;;80     			err = CDMAReceDeal(pCDMARece,">");
0000a8  a128              ADR      r1,|L6.332|
0000aa  4628              MOV      r0,r5
0000ac  f7fffffe          BL       CDMAReceDeal
0000b0  9009              STR      r0,[sp,#0x24]
;;;81     			Mem_free(pCDMARece);
0000b2  4628              MOV      r0,r5
0000b4  f7fffffe          BL       Mem_free
;;;82     			if(err != 0)
0000b8  f89d0024          LDRB     r0,[sp,#0x24]
0000bc  b168              CBZ      r0,|L6.218|
;;;83     			{
;;;84     				CDMASendDatas((uint8_t *)sendCmd,sendlen); //通知CDMA要通过哪个通道发送多少个字节的数据
0000be  4631              MOV      r1,r6
0000c0  a801              ADD      r0,sp,#4
0000c2  f7fffffe          BL       CDMASendDatas
;;;85     				pCDMARece = OSQPend(CDMARecieveQ,150,&err);
0000c6  aa09              ADD      r2,sp,#0x24
0000c8  2196              MOVS     r1,#0x96
0000ca  481a              LDR      r0,|L6.308|
0000cc  6800              LDR      r0,[r0,#0]  ; CDMARecieveQ
0000ce  f7fffffe          BL       OSQPend
0000d2  4605              MOV      r5,r0
;;;86     				Mem_free(pCDMARece);
0000d4  4628              MOV      r0,r5
0000d6  f7fffffe          BL       Mem_free
                  |L6.218|
;;;87     			}
;;;88     		}											 //实际要发送的数据
;;;89     		CDMASendDatas((uint8_t *)pCDMASend->data,pCDMASend->datLength);
0000da  8821              LDRH     r1,[r4,#0]
0000dc  6860              LDR      r0,[r4,#4]
0000de  f7fffffe          BL       CDMASendDatas
;;;90     		pCDMARece = OSQPend(CDMARecieveQ,150,&err);  //发送成功
0000e2  aa09              ADD      r2,sp,#0x24
0000e4  2196              MOVS     r1,#0x96
0000e6  4813              LDR      r0,|L6.308|
0000e8  6800              LDR      r0,[r0,#0]  ; CDMARecieveQ
0000ea  f7fffffe          BL       OSQPend
0000ee  4605              MOV      r5,r0
;;;91     		Mem_free(pCDMARece);                         //SEND OK
0000f0  4628              MOV      r0,r5
0000f2  f7fffffe          BL       Mem_free
;;;92     		
;;;93     	    carAllRecord.netFlow += pCDMASend->datLength;//网络流量（字节）
0000f6  4816              LDR      r0,|L6.336|
0000f8  f8d0002a          LDR      r0,[r0,#0x2a]  ; carAllRecord
0000fc  8821              LDRH     r1,[r4,#0]
0000fe  4408              ADD      r0,r0,r1
000100  4913              LDR      r1,|L6.336|
000102  f8c1002a          STR      r0,[r1,#0x2a]  ; carAllRecord
;;;94     		
;;;95     		Mem_free(pCDMASend->data);
000106  6860              LDR      r0,[r4,#4]
000108  f7fffffe          BL       Mem_free
;;;96     		Mem_free(pCDMASend);
00010c  4620              MOV      r0,r4
00010e  f7fffffe          BL       Mem_free
;;;97     		
;;;98     		carAllRecord.messageNum ++;                  //发送的消息条数
000112  480f              LDR      r0,|L6.336|
000114  f8d00026          LDR      r0,[r0,#0x26]  ; carAllRecord
000118  1c40              ADDS     r0,r0,#1
00011a  490d              LDR      r1,|L6.336|
00011c  f8c10026          STR      r0,[r1,#0x26]  ; carAllRecord
                  |L6.288|
000120  e77b              B        |L6.26|
;;;99     	}
;;;100    }
;;;101    void CDMAPowerOpen_Close(uint8_t flag)//这段代码是用来启动/关闭CDMA
                          ENDP

000122  0000              DCW      0x0000
                  |L6.292|
